1.title: Ball's in Your Court
1.plot: Basketball fan Duane is excited about the prospect of planning his wedding, and having the chance to explore his own ideas. But his bride to be Mandy is afraid that his overly masculine tastes won't jive with her warm, colorful and romantic vision.

2.title: Retro Wedding Rewind
2.plot: Frugal Groom Paul is a cool cat with a plethora of quirky ideas to create his throwback wedding from yesteryear. Leslie, his event planner fiancée, can't squeeze time in her calendar to plan her own dream day so Paul volunteered himself.

3.title: Hunting for Deals
3.plot: Groom Andrew is a low-key guys-guy, who isn't interested in the costs or details that women (a.k.a. his bride-to-be Lyndsey) get bogged down in. Will he forgo all the necessary details in order to go hunting and fishing with his buddies?

4.title: Putting on the Glitz
4.plot: Groom Leonard wants a big party, whereas his bride-to-be Patricia wants to avoid the usual wedding fanfare by having a casual beachside affair. It remains to be seen whether he can pull off his BIG and BLINGY wedding and if Patricia will be satisfied.

5.title: Field of Broken Dreams
5.plot: Over confident Groom Vince wants to plan his dream wedding centered around his first love - soccer. His demanding bride Beata has very different ideas of what constitutes a dream wedding and soccer isn't top on her list.

6.title: All Bets Are Off
6.plot: Frugal groom Mike is full of whacky ideas and thinks planning a wedding should be a piece of cake. He wants to create the feeling of over the top drama with a "secret agent spy" meets "luxe casino" theme for the wedding.

9.title: Cleared for Takeoff
9.plot: Groom Brad has bravely opted to take the wedding planning responsibilities from bride Michelle, his bargain hunting future wife.

imdb.plot outline: Rich Groom Poor Groom promises to bring the same high stakes drama you've come to know and love on Rich Bride, with a whole new twist: The groom plans the entire wedding! Everything he chooses is kept secret from his bride, including her dress! For a $5000 boost to the wedding budget, the bride surrenders control and is kept completely in the dark until the big day.
imdb.title: Rich Groom Poor Groom
plot: _Rich Groom Poor Groom_ (qv) promises to bring the same high stakes drama you've come to know and love on Rich Bride, with a whole new twist: The groom plans the entire wedding! Everything he chooses is kept secret from his bride, including her dress! For a $5000 boost to the wedding budget, the bride surrenders control and is kept completely in the dark until the big day.
